name: Dungeon Game (LlamaDev Games)
description:
Dungeon Game (Soon to be rebranded to "Aspect") is a two person dungeon crawler project, with a whole variety of planned features, lore, weapons, enemies, and spells planned. The player can travel down into the depths of a dungeon, armed at first with only a stick and a bow, become stronger, and find new treasure, to fight new enemies, and discover what lies at the bottom of the dungeon.

Controls
  • WASD to move
  • Left Click = Use Weapon
  • 1 = Item Slot 1
  • 2 = Item Slot  2
  • 3 = Item Slot 3
  • 4 = Item Slot 4
  • Scroll = Change Item Slot
  • Escape = Pause
  • Return = Go Down Ladder / Open Chest / Use Altar

You can watch the DevLogs on Youtube here or listen to the soundtrack on Youtube here. You can also join the community discord here, or go to the official community wiki here.
